long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better Color Picker is a user-oriented Chrome extension that allows you to easily pick colors from any web page. It aims to offer the highest user experience with its well-thought-out interface.

Thanks to its large zoom section, this extension helps you choose the right colors easily. It also displays over 30,000 hand-selected custom color names, helping you recognize the colors you've chosen. It automatically copies the HEX code of the selected color to the clipboard.

All colors you select are displayed in the extension window, with their color codes and names under the relevant domain names. You can manage the colors you choose from the 'Picked Colors' section.

Better Color Picker is designed especially for UX/UI designers and web developers. Selected colors automatically sync with your Chrome account rather than being stored locally. In this way, you can access the colors you choose by logging into your Google account from any device you want.

We believe in the importance of colors in the web design and development process. We aim to develop the extension to provide an in-depth solution beyond just a color picker. You can support us by leaving reviews.
